title: Create swipe phase component (Steps 5, 6.1, 6.3)
description:
Create swipe card component adapted from CS-01's SwipePhase.

File: app/fo-01/components/swipe-phase.tsx

Key changes from CS-01:
- Vertical swipe (up/down) instead of horizontal (left/right)
- Down = keep (toward user), Up = discard (away)
- Counter: 'Affirmation X of 10'
- Label: 'Swipe for next'
- Feedback: 'Successfully saved' / 'Discarded'

Framer Motion implementation:
- y motion value instead of x
- Swipe threshold ~100px
- Keyboard support: Arrow keys (down=keep, up=discard)

Props: {
  affirmation: string,
  index: number,
  total: number,
  onSwipe: (direction: 'up' | 'down', affirmation: string) => void,
  isLoading?: boolean
}

Reference: app/chat-survey/components/swipe-phase.tsx
acceptance_criteria: Swipe works vertically, visual feedback shows, counter updates
closed_reason: Created swipe-phase.tsx with vertical swipe (y axis) using Framer Motion. Down=keep, Up=discard. Shows counter 'Affirmation X of 10', direction labels, and toast feedback ('Successfully saved'/'Discarded'). Keyboard support: ArrowDown=keep, ArrowUp=discard. Integrated into fo-experience.tsx step 5. Batch complete screen handles steps 6.1/6.3.
